creator: drapal@avaya.com
text:
The log4.dtd requires class/method to be provided, but XMLLayout.cpp doesn't 
emit them.
Is this a log4j bug or a log4cxx bug?
creator: mwomack@apache.org
carnold@apache.org
text:
This was a log4cxx-0.9.7 bug that has already been fixed in the log4cxx CVS HEAD.  Should not have 
been logged against log4j, but possibly log4cxx didn't have a JIRA at that point.
